author: scheu
msg: Removing the "fix" that I added that suppresses xsi:nil="true" when

author: scheu
msg: 1) The Java2WSDL and WSDL2Java emitters contained many references to literal strings representing
namespaces and namespace prefixes.  These references are changed to use the constant
strings and methods in the org.apache.axis.Constants class.  This will allow the
emitters and runtime to use a consistent set of namespaces/prefixes.  Plus any changes to the
namespace uris will automatically be reflected in the emitters.
2) Added additional namespace and namespace prefix constants to org.apache.axis.Constants.
3) Added static methods (like isSchemaXSD(string)) to Constants to query whether a string matches

author: scheu
msg: Don't write out xsi:nil="true" if PROP_SEND_XSI is false.

author: igors
msg: Added methods to retrieve DeployableItem for named handlers,
services and transports managed by the DeploymentRegistry.
This is necessary for dynamic reconfiguration of the processing
